business_definition: Main working storage area for credit card application data
Working storage container for credit card transaction processing fields
Attention identifier key that indicates which terminal key was pressed (PIC X(5))
Condition indicating Enter key was pressed (VALUE 'ENTER')
Condition indicating Clear key was pressed (VALUE 'CLEAR')
Condition indicating Program Attention key 1 was pressed (VALUE 'PA1  ')
Condition indicating Program Attention key 2 was pressed (VALUE 'PA2  ')
Condition indicating Program Function key 1 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK01')
Condition indicating Program Function key 2 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK02')
Condition indicating Program Function key 3 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK03')
Condition indicating Program Function key 4 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK04')
Condition indicating Program Function key 5 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK05')
Condition indicating Program Function key 6 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK06')
Condition indicating Program Function key 7 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK07')
Condition indicating Program Function key 8 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK08')
Condition indicating Program Function key 9 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK09')
Condition indicating Program Function key 10 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK10')
Condition indicating Program Function key 11 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK11')
Condition indicating Program Function key 12 was pressed (VALUE 'PFK12')
Name of the next program to be executed in the transaction flow (PIC X(8))
Name of the next BMS mapset to be displayed (PIC X(7))
Name of the next BMS map within the mapset to be displayed (PIC X(7))
Error message text to be displayed to the user (PIC X(75))
Return message text to be displayed to the user (PIC X(75))
Condition indicating no return message is present (VALUE LOW-VALUES)
Credit card account identifier in alphanumeric format (PIC X(11)) (VALUE SPACES)
Credit card account identifier in numeric format (REDEFINES CC-ACCT-ID) (PIC 9(11))
Credit card number in alphanumeric format (PIC X(16)) (VALUE SPACES)
Credit card number in numeric format (REDEFINES CC-CARD-NUM) (PIC 9(16))
Customer identifier in alphanumeric format (PIC X(09)) (VALUE SPACES)
Customer identifier in numeric format (REDEFINES CC-CUST-ID) (PIC 9(9))
